item.title: Getting Cell Contents
Insert Hyperlinks in Worksheet
New Line in Cells
item.description: Aspose.Cells - New Line in Cells To ensure that text in a cell can be read, explicit line breaks and text wrapping can be applied. Text wrapping turns one line into several in a cell, which explicit line breaks put in breaks exactly where you want them. To wrap text in a cell, use the Aspose.Cells.Style.IsTextWrapped property. C# Workbook workbook = new Workbook(); // Creating a Workbook object Worksheet sheet = workbook.
